# Download & Install

## Download TrueConf Room for free

### Microsoft Windows ver. 7 SP1 or newer (v5.0.0)

https://trueconf.com/download/room/trueconf_room_setup.exe

### Debian 10 (v4.3.3)

https://trueconf.com/download/room/linux/trueconf_room_debian10_amd64.deb

### Debian 11 (v5.0.0)

https://trueconf.com/download/room/linux/trueconf_room_debian11_amd64.deb

### Debian 12 (v5.0.0)

https://trueconf.com/download/room/linux/trueconf_room_debian12_amd64.deb

### Ubuntu 20.04 (v4.3.3)

https://trueconf.com/download/room/linux/trueconf_room_ubuntu2004_amd64.deb

### Ubuntu 22.04 (v4.3.3)

https://trueconf.ru/download/room/linux/trueconf_room_ubuntu2204_amd64.deb

### Ubuntu 24.04 (v5.0.0)

https://trueconf.ru/download/room/linux/trueconf_room_ubuntu2404_amd64.deb

### Raspberry Pi OS 11 64-bit (v4.3.3)

https://trueconf.ru/download/room/linux/trueconf_room_raspberry11_arm64.deb

### About TrueConf Room

Visit [Conference Room Software](https://trueconf.com/products/room.html)

## Download TrueConf VideoSDK for free

### Microsoft Windows ver. 7 SP1 or newer (v5.0.0)

https://trueconf.com/download/videosdk/windows/trueconf_videosdk_setup.exe
